item.title: After effects video for a logo - Upwork
item.description:
Hello everyone,

I am launching my own interior design company and have already completed the logo and branding, which is inspired by the circular color palettes provided in paint shops like Jotun. I want to create a promotional video for my brand that highlights this concept with vibrant, popping colors. I'm looking for someone skilled in Illustrator and storytelling to bring this vision to life.

Thank you!

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 16, 2024 10:05 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Advertisement, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, 2D Animation, Animation
Skills: Advertisement, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, 2D Animation, Animation
Country: United Arab Emirates

item.title: Video Production - Upwork
item.description:
We are a crypto payment solutions company, and we wish to create a series of videos with different people worldwide who add our debit card to their Apple Pay or Google Pay and film themselves shopping for coffee, food, or anything else with our card.

Of course, the card will be topped up with bitcoin/crypto, so you can go ahead to any shop and buy with our card.

I have attached an example of a good video that can show you the direction.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 16, 2024 10:01 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: Israel

item.title: Podcast Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled content creator to help us with our podcast, Generally Curious. The role involves creating solid video clips and other engaging pieces of content to enhance our podcast episodes. As a content creator, you will be responsible for brainstorming creative ideas, researching topics, and editing videos. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and content creation, as well as a good understanding of podcasting. Excellent communication skills and attention to detail are also essential for this role.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Content creation
- Research
- Podcasting
- Communication
- Attention to detail

Hourly Range: $12.00-$46.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 09:59 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Podcast, Audio Editing, Content Writing, Marketing, Video Editing
Skills: Podcast, Audio Editing, Content Writing, Marketing, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Thumbnail creation for YouTube video ads - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a talented designer to create eye-catching YouTube thumbnails for our e-commerce video ads. We need one amazing thumbnail per month, with the potential for more in the future.

What we need:
- Unique, attention-grabbing designs
- Thumbnails that stand out and are relevant to our products

What we're looking for in you:
- A creative person
- Experience with YouTube thumbnails - experience with e-commerce or ads is a plus
- Someone who’s easy to work with and open to feedback

This isn't a massive commitment – just a small, ongoing project where you can let your creativity shine.

Please include some links in your response to show off your skills.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 09:58 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:YouTube Thumbnail
Skills: YouTube Thumbnail
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Trailer Movie Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are in search of a skilled movie trailer maker for our YouTube channel.

Your objective will be to create concept trailers for unreleased movies.

Please refer to the videos from these channels for an example:

https://www.youtube.com/@TeaserPRO/videos

https://www.youtube.com/@ScreenCultureOfficial/videos

This will be a long-term job with numerous projects per month.

To make sure you have read everything please write me concept trailer in the beginning.

Budget: $500

item.title: Video Editor Needed for a Faceless Documentary & Travel YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
The documentary style will be focused on basketball.

•Videos need to be 12–20 minutes in duration.
•Clips, will need to be sourced by you

I’m looking for someone with the following qualities:
•Fast turnaround times 4-5 days
•Fast response times
•Good understanding of storytelling and YouTube  retention.
• An excellent understanding of YouTube copyright policy.

You significantly improve your chance of being hired if you provide samples of your documentary videos.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 16, 2024 09:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Explainer Video, Video Production

item.title: Video editor needed for YouTube Channel *long term* - Upwork
item.description:
We are a dynamic and fast-growing YouTube channel dedicated to producing engaging, high-quality content that captivates and inspires our audience. Our videos cover a wide range of topics and are designed to make viewers think deeply and stay excited about each new upload.

**Job Description:**
We are seeking a talented and creative YouTube Video Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong eye for visual storytelling and be adept at using both premium stock footage and compelling images to create videos that build anticipation and captivate our audience.

**Responsibilities:**
- Edit and assemble raw video footage into polished, engaging YouTube videos.
- Utilize premium stock footage (provided) to create anticipation and enhance visual interest.
- Source and incorporate images that capture viewers' imagination and convey the essence of the video.
- Ensure all content aligns with our brand’s voice and style.
- Collaborate with the content creation team to understand video requirements and deliver on time.
- Implement feedback and revisions promptly.

**Qualifications:**
- Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with a focus on YouTube or online content.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong portfolio demonstrating the ability to create engaging and visually appealing videos.
- Experience with using stock footage and images creatively.
- Excellent attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- A passion for storytelling and a deep understanding of what makes content engaging.

**Preferred Skills:**
- Familiarity with motion graphics and basic animation.
- Knowledge of color correction and audio editing.
- Experience with creating thumbnails and other visual content for YouTube.

**How to Apply:**
If you are passionate about video editing and excited about creating content that captivates and inspires, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, a cover letter explaining why you are a great fit for this role.

Join us and be part of a creative team that is dedicated to producing videos that make a difference. We look forward to seeing your work.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 16, 2024 09:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: Ireland
click to apply
